Bonne année Nathalie, Terry and I enjoyed our visit to Khewa yesterday. Such beautiful things you have in your shop - and of course YOUR art! We came away with a limited edition copy of “The Wisdom Keepers” number 1 / 99. The print itself measures approximately 20’x10’. The lovely woman tending the shop told us that upon request, you would be willing to prepare a copy of “Carried Away” in the same size as we purchased yesterday. We understand, hopefully correctly, that you have not yet produced copies of “Carried Away” in this size? If that is the case, we would be thrilled to have number 1 / 99 of this limited edition as well, matted the same as the “Wisdom Keepers”. Please let me know if this is possible. If you would prefer to discuss by phone, my cell number is 613-878-5548. Fingers crossed we can make this happen! Merci beaucoup, Christa (and Terry)

customer_message.message:
Bonjour Laurence,
Pas de Souci. Merci de nous avoir envoyé ce message. Sachez que l'événement de Novembre à été repoussé au Printemps 2020 :) Nous avons eu une saison magnifique et n'avons pas eu le temps de faire notre ouverture/agrandissement.
Nous garderons votre coussin précieusement dans l'attente de votre retour de France ! Quelle belle coïncidence ou sinchronicité... l'image du Coussin *Racine d'un autre monde* à été crée en France (été 2013) alors que j'étais dans le village de mon papa (un Gascon) près de Bergerac! Un jour... je caresse le souhait d'avoir une alliance avec une petite boutique du Sud-Ouest et y faire du commerce.
Vous êtes dans quelle région pour votre séjour?
Au plaisir,
Nathalie Coutou

customer_message.message:
Bonjour Soleil,
Je fais la même chose avec les miens c'est tout juste si je ne couche pas avec... ils sont tellement comfortable !!!! Pour le nettoyage, il est préférable à la main dans de l'eau froide avec un savon très doux à base de glycérine ou du shampooing de bébé. Les frotter gentillement avec une brosse douce ou avec les doigts, bien rincer et les laisser sécher à l'air. Il est possible qu'ils perdent un peu de couleur ce qui est tout à fait normal étant donner que c'est une peau de chevreuil naturelle teinte. S'ils se déforment un peu, ils vont reprendre leurs formes lorsqu'ils seront portés.
Nous sommes présentement physiquement fermé au public suite à la situation de la pandémie, par contre, nous sommes ouvert en ligne www.khewa.com. Nous améliorons et alimentons notre site à tous les jours avec de nouveaux produits. Nous vérifions notre messagerie vocale et procédons à la livraison par envoi postal ou ramassage à la boutique, dehors, en respectant la distanciiation sociale.
Merci pour votre fidélité et nous vous souhaitons une très bonne santé à vous et vos proches.
Isabelle et l'équipe de Khewa !! 819-459-2112

PLEASE FORWARD THIS EMAIL TO SOMEONE IN YOUR COMPANY WHO IS ALLOWED TO MAKE IMPORTANT DECISIONS!
We have hacked your website http://www.khewa.com and extracted your databases.
How did this happen? Our team has found a vulnerability within your site that we were able to exploit. After finding the vulnerability we were able to get your database credentials and extract your entire database and move the information to an offshore server.
What does this mean?
We will systematically go through a series of steps of totally damaging your reputation. First your database will be leaked or sold to the highest bidder which they will use with whatever their intentions are. Next if there are e-mails found they will be e-mailed that their information has been sold or leaked and your site http://www.khewa.com was at fault thusly damaging your reputation and having angry customers/associates with whatever angry customers/associates do. Lastly any links that you have indexed in the search engines will be de-indexed based off of blackhat techniques that we used in the past to de-index our targets.
How do I stop this?
We are willing to refrain from destroying your site's reputation for a small fee. The current fee is $2000 USD in bitcoins (BTC).
Send the bitcoin to the following Bitcoin address (Copy and paste as it is case sensitive):
1Md6imvB2neTF3s1kFiMG473k1XrBhxQhF
Once you have paid we will automatically get informed that it was your payment. Please note that you have to make payment within 5 days after receiving this notice or the database leak, e-mails dispatched, and de-index of your site WILL start!
How do I get Bitcoins?
You can easily buy bitcoins via several websites or even offline from a Bitcoin-ATM. We suggest you to start with http://coinmama.com for buying bitcoins with credit/debit cards or http://localbitcoins.com for other type of payments.
What if I don’t pay?
If you decide not to pay, we will start the attack at the indicated date and uphold it until you do, there’s no counter measure to this, you will only end up wasting more money trying to find a solution. We will completely destroy your reputation amongst google and your customers.
This is not a hoax, do not reply to this email, don’t try to reason or negotiate, we will not read any replies. Once you have paid we will stop what we were doing and you will never hear from us again!
Please note that Bitcoin is anonymous and no one will find out that you have complied.

customer_message.message:
Hello,
My spouse and I are big fans of your store. We always bring relatives by when visiting us in Wakefield.
I was in your wonderful store just before Christmas and bought a pair of moccasins as a gift for my four year old son. It was a bit of a risk in terms of gifts, as he often views putting on footwear as a chore. As a child, I have fond memories of us kids receiving new pairs of moccasins from my parents for Christmas and I thought I might restart that tradition with my own kids. Alas, this year it was not meant to be. I'm optimistic that next year, with one more year of life experience, he will be a little more receptive to and appreciative of a pair of moccasins. For now, the moccasins remain untouched, tags still in place. They have not been tried on and I have the receipt. I was hoping to return them but figured the store was likely closed due to the lockdown. Please advise on what to do. Thanks.
John

The U.S. consumer market is the holy grail for retail manufacturers.
By way of introduction, I am Gary Cohen, and I represent Consumer Products International (https://consumerproductsintl.com).
At Consumer Products International, we understand the challenges domestic and international consumer brands confront when deciding to bring their products to American consumers. CPI works with international and domestic consumer goods manufacturers who are seeking to expand their distribution reach within the United States or enter the world’s largest consumer market for the first time.
During my research, your brand recently caught my attention, which is why I would like to discuss the possibility of expanding your national distribution reach in the U.S.
CPI provides expertise in all areas of distribution, and our services include the following:
 Turnkey/One-stop solution  FDA  Active accounts with major U.S. distributors and retailers  An executive team that has held executive positions with Walmart and Amazon, the two largest online and brick-and-mortar retailers in the U.S.  Proven sales force with public relations, branding, and marketing all under one roof  Focus on new and existing product lines  Warehousing and logistics
CPI’s executive team has decades of experience in representing many different consumer goods categories. We have worked with buyers from national and regional retail chains, which gives your brand a fast track to market.
Please contact me directly so that we can discuss your brand further.
Kind Regards,
Gary Cohen VP of Business Development Consumer Products International 101 Plaza Real S, Ste #224 Boca Raton, FL 33432 Office: 561-544-0719 gcohen@consumerproductsintl.com
